channel.title: Help on adding custom crowns!
channel.description:
Okay so like, I do have 2 custom crowns working. The only 2 are mod and admin which is PlayerRights = 1 and PlayerRights = 2.
How would i add more? I've used the search bar and I really cant find any detailed help. I'm using Galkon's client.
Please help! Reply here or add me on msn : Srhicecube@hotmail.com or Skype: Death.is.back
Thanks.

item.title: Help on adding custom crowns!
item.dc:creator: @v0idscape v0idscape
item.description:
@v0idscape wrote:

I did see this TuT, I really didn’t know where this part is.

Step 1. Find this: Code:

modIcons = new Sprite[2];

Make it this:
Code:

modIcons = new Sprite[5];

That makes it where we can load 3 more new crowns.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on adding custom crowns!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363788.0.html

Next time use the search bar… Properly… It took me all of 1 minute…
